name: Car Mashing
description:
Rapidly press spacebar or click the button in the middle of your screen to move your car. The faster it's press/ clicked, the faster you will go.

Choose the appearance of your car and the track you want to race in.

Play by yourself in free play and time trials, or challenge your friends to see who can reach 3 laps the fastest or who can click the most!

Multiplayer only allows 20 people max in the server so if you cannot get in, it's because the servers are full, so try another time (game not yet tested with 20 people).
